abstract.t: This document describes a YANG model for a commonly used datastructure for RPKI Validated ROA Payload data. This specific datastructure is commonly used in the transport between RPKI Cache Validators and BGP routers.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document defines a base YANG data module to structure RPKI, Validated ROA Prefix (VRP) information. Such export functionality has emerged in several implementations of relaying party (RP) software, but was not previously standardized, resulting in loose coordination between implementers. This module establishes a simple and consistent interface for information export by RPs drawing from best practices observed in existing implementations.
